body_html:
@gbildson Thx, you inspired me!
In my situation , I changed the tensorflow code and fix it!
change the code in tensorflow/python/ops/nn_impl.py
math_ops.squared_difference(y, array_ops.stop_gradient(mean)),
to
difference = math_ops.subtract(y, array_ops.stop_gradient(mean))
math_ops.mul(difference,difference),
which is in mements def.

body:
@gbildson Thx, you inspired me!
In my situation , I changed the tensorflow code and fix it!
change the code in tensorflow/python/ops/nn_impl.py
`math_ops.squared_difference(y, array_ops.stop_gradient(mean)),`
to
`    
difference = math_ops.subtract(y, array_ops.stop_gradient(mean))
`
`
    math_ops.mul(difference,difference),
`
which is in mements def.
